home.sliderTitulo3: There is also a place for you, little one!
home.sliderDesc1: Our community knows the best areas for your pet to enjoy a pleasant walk.
home.sliderDesc2: No problem! We can take care of all of them.
home.sliderDesc3: Peludets! It is not just for cats or dogs. We have room for all kinds of pets.
home.cardBox1: Find a place where your pet is comfortable while you enjoy your vacation!
home.cardBox2: It's not just for cats and dogs only. Our community can take care of any type of pet.
home.cardBox3: You can ask for how many walks and how long they are needed.
home.cardBox4: We have a professional section for exotic pets with special care.
